message.body: I forgot to bring home the allure of turquoise book! It's due in April...what do you want me to do?

Shyz. Can u pls... -Scan... •table of contents •index. -Tell me approx... •how many pages •how many illustrations/photos. -Assess flexibility of binding for scan/copying -Comment on anything else relevant. Thanx, Sweetness. Email or txt--doesn't matter. <x3
